value:
There's not much in the village of Iz,
but it is a peaceful place. To think
that pirates would despoil it...

The food here is delicious, but I do
find myself longing for my mother's
cooking. I hope she's all right.

You need help carrying equipment
to storage? No problem at all. I'm
off!

Gazing at the horizon tires my eyes.
I had to rest them! I certainly wasn't
dozing...

Lord Leif is kind to everyone. And
the Askrans seem so generous. If
only all the nobility were like this...

My name is Ronan. Am I
mistaken, or is this the castle
of $Nu?

I swear on my bow that I will
protect everyone!

I made up my mind to fight.
I must put fear aside!

Maybe... Maybe I am not cut
out for this. Am I, Mother?

Thank you. I will be certain to keep
my bow arm limber.

I am Ronan, a simple hunter. I do
have confidence in my skill with a
bow, however. Please let me join you!

Great work today. You outwitted
our foes once again!$k$pI've doubted myself time and again
since arriving here. Yes, I can hit my
mark. But am I really strong enough?$k$pI will put my doubts aside and keep
fighting. I'm no crusader, but I can
do my utmost. And that is not all...$k$pStrong or not, I learned a lesson in
Thracia...sulking and refusing to help
accomplishes nothing.$k$pIf you need something done, call on
me. I will do whatever I can to aid
you. I am always ready to help.
せやっ
I'm up!
うっ…
This is bad...!
I'll hit my mark.
No chance I'll miss!
There's no choice.
I have to try!
Mother, I...
Hehe
I am Ronan and I have a request. Please allow me to fight with you.
Wha—oh! How can I help you?
I'm confident in my skill with a bow. I will try my best not to be a burden to you.
I was a hunter in my village. If you require some hunting to be done, please leave it to me.
Pirate attacks were not uncommon back home. I will never allow a pirate to take me by surprise again.
Sorry to make you worry, Mother. However...I must fight. That is what I've decided.
Is it strange that I always speak politely? But you are my commanding officer. Surely...
Of course.
I can't stand by.
Don't try to stop me.
